name: Mad Marbles (ManuCoder)
description:
In this physics-based 3D platformer, take control of colorful, bouncy spheres and compete with your friends to see who can reach the finish line first. Roll, jump, swing and push yourself to become the winner!

Developed by Survivors Studio:

Manuel Bajonero - Programming, Design

Anthony Montes - Graphics, Planification

Wilian Lévano - Graphics, Design
